archdesc.runner: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.
did.abstract: The collection contains a marriage license for George W. Cheatham and Nannie P. Horsley.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Permission to publish material from the Cheatham/Horsley Marriage License must be obtained from Special Collections, Virginia Tech.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: Cheatham/Horsley Marriage License, Ms2009-107, Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The Cheatham/Horsley Marriage License was donated to Special Collections in 1995.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The processing, arrangement, and description of the Cheatham/Horsley Marriage License commenced and was completed in July 2009.

bioghist.head: Biographical Information
bioghist.p: George W. Cheatham was born about 1848 in Appomattox County, Virginia. Nannie P. Horsley, born about 1853, lived Nelson County, Virginia, until her marriage to Cheatham in 1873. They had two daughters: Elizabeth E. (b. abt. 1875) and Amanda H. (b. abt. 1879). The family had a farm in Appomattox County.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The marriage license was completed in Appomattox, Virginia, and lists information about George and Nannie, including their ages at the time of the marriage, places of birth, and parents. In addition, the license notes the date of the wedding (October 13, 1873) and the name of the minister who conducted the ceremony.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: A scanned jpg of this document is available through the Special Collections website.
